channel.description: Removed due to so many stuck up fuck whits who've never been in this position because you're all bitches.

your right I’ve never been in the position of calling my teacher a whore, because i’m not a fucking moron.

Laughing at how we’re all bitches because you were in the wrong and we told you.
[/quote]
Exactly I’ve seen so many threads like this where they think they’re right, they get told they’re wrong countless times, and they just end up saying “well guess what fuck u idc about ur opinions u bitchs”, when you asked of it by posting in the first place.[/quote]
I think he belongs right next to WetDreamsss in your sig.

EDIT: Just so you know, I meant at the bottom. Not at the disrespect thing at the top.

item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Skyro:

Wow, I’m getting raged to shit. How do you think i feel about this?

I have viewpoints on parents that clearly no one on this site agrees on, but that doesn’t go for teachers. Like I said, they don’t wanna be there any more than you do. They literally take their lives to educate you so you could maybe have some kind of hope to be something one day, and you call her a whore.

item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Skyro:

@Travas: It’s actually illegal for a teacher to make comments on students, especially saying what she said. You’d understand if you were there. Even the other teacher who likes me said, that’s illegal and what she said wasn’t right and she was sorry on the teachers behalf. Besides, I do like learning except she has a problem with me and she will get me in trouble for anything. She even goes out of her own way to get me in trouble. I know why this occurs and it’s from a personality clash.

When I googled it, only student teacher dating came up, but I’m almost positive it’s not illegal for teachers to insult students. Atleast not in Michigan.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

She was having a bad day, and you didn’t handle the situation very well.

edit: @travis: I don’t think so. In 6th grade a student was talking back or something (I was in the other class and walked in to get something out of my desk, so I missed the reason why I happened), but the teacher got mad and smashed a yard stick on his desk. With teachers who get that mad, I think kids could get seriously injured.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Teachers should be allowed to hit disrespectful students like you.

‘Is she a whore’
Ok, she bitched at you because you disrespected her, and you call her a whore? I don’t get it. You’re in the wrong more than she is. You should be ashamed. You should be grateful you’re even getting an education.

Read full topic
